alert.note: Alert for Anoka; Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 11:31AM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota and Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Red Wing L/D 3 affecting Goodhue, Dakota and Pierce Counties. Mississippi River at Red Wing affecting Goodhue and Pierce Counties. Mississippi River at Fridley abv 37th Ave NE affecting Anoka and Hennepin Counties. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fridley abv 37th Ave NE. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water begins to impact water plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1030 AM CDT Saturday, the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 18.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.5 feet on 04/14/1969. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
